description: Write a function that checks if `url` has a valid format (e.g., 'scheme://host'). It does not need to be a full RFC 3986 parser. Example (Valid): is_url_valid_format("http://google.com") -> 1. Example (Invalid): is_url_valid_format("google.com") -> 0. Example (Invalid): is_url_valid_format("http:/google.com") -> 0.
